subject: Further details
body:
Good day Doris,

Thanks for your reply. Based on my previous email to you, I am an 
individual financial consultant and I consult for a group of wealthy 
individuals and we are willing to provide funding for any profitable 
business or project. Our initial funding capacity is limited to between 
USD1M and USD250M. If this amount falls within your proposed project or 
need, please kindly let me know so that I can brief you more on the 
modalities, procedures, funding terms and conditions.

Be informed that the proposal that I made to you is 100% risk free and 
legitimate. I would like to know the loan amount that you are looking at 
so that we can discuss further and negotiate my terms.

If you have any further questions, let me know so that I can clarify you 
accordingly.

As soon as I hear back from you, I will provide you with our funding 
terms and conditions for your review.

Regards,

Fuli Wang.

Hello there,

That sounds really interesting! Could you please tell me more about the 
types of financial services you provide? I'm particularly interested in 
understanding how these services could potentially benefit someone like 
me.
Best wishes,
Doris

subject: Re: Further details
body:
Hello Doris,

Thank you for your interest in our services. We provide a wide range of financial services, including funding for profitable businesses or projects. Our aim is to help individuals and businesses achieve their financial goals.

Our services are tailored to meet the specific needs of each client. This means we can offer solutions that are perfectly suited to your circumstances and objectives.

Could you please tell me more about your business or project? What kind of funding are you looking for? This will help us understand how best we can assist you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Doris
